abstract: Comprehensive software craftsmanship guide based on Robert C. Martin's 'Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship'. Contains 45 rules across 8 categories covering naming, functions, comments, formatting, objects, error handling, testing, and class design. Each rule includes detailed explanations, real-world examples comparing incorrect vs. correct implementations, and rationale to guide code reviews, refactoring decisions, and new development.
